subject: Re: Searching for a mail client
body:
"Alexandre Neubert"  writes:

> Hello,
>
> I am looking for a good and leight weight mailing client for my laptop; one
> constraint however; it has to work without X (because I dont have always
> access to a graphic interface) and must be as simple to configure as
> possible. I already had a look at gnus and mutt, but I didn't manage to get
> access to my gmail account since this one uses ssl encryption (and I didn't
> manage to make it work).
>
> Does anybody knows another mail client? Or does anybody has a simple
> tutorial for gnus or mutt?

I use my own imapua.el which works in emacs as gnus does... but it
isn't as mad as gnus. It only works with an imap server though.

If you're interested mail me offlist and I'll send you the lisp.
